mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_jinlong_system_user_info ( user_id, real_name, nick_name, gender, age, id_number, telephone, zone_id, address, post_code, home_page, qq_number, ali_pay, image, description, state ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{realName}, #{nickName}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{idNumber}, #{telephone}, #{zoneId}, #{address}, #{postCode}, #{homePage}, #{qqNumber}, #{aliPay}, #{image}, #{description}, #{state} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE tbl_jinlong_system_user_info
real_name = #{realName},
nick_name = #{nickName},
gender = #{gender},
age = #{age},
id_number = #{idNumber},
telephone = #{telephone},
zone_id = #{zoneId},
address = #{address},
post_code = #{postCode},
home_page = #{homePage},
qq_number = #{qqNumber},
ali_pay = #{aliPay},
image = #{image},
description = #{description},
state = #{state}
user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select:
SELECT user_id AS userId, real_name AS realName, nick_name AS nickName, gender AS gender, age AS age, id_number AS idNumber, telephone AS telephone, zone_id AS zoneId, address AS address, post_code AS postCode, home_page AS homePage, qq_number AS qqNumber, ali_pay AS aliPay, image AS image, description AS description, state AS state FROM tbl_jinlong_system_user_info
user_id = #{id}

SELECT user_id AS userId, real_name AS realName, nick_name AS nickName, gender AS gender, age AS age, id_number AS idNumber, telephone AS telephone, zone_id AS zoneId, address AS address, post_code AS postCode, home_page AS homePage, qq_number AS qqNumber, ali_pay AS aliPay, image AS image, description AS description, state AS state FROM tbl_jinlong_system_user_info ORDER BY user_id

SELECT user_id AS userId, real_name AS realName, nick_name AS nickName, gender AS gender, age AS age, id_number AS idNumber, telephone AS telephone, zone_id AS zoneId, address AS address, post_code AS postCode, home_page AS homePage, qq_number AS qqNumber, ali_pay AS aliPay, image AS image, description AS description, state AS state FROM tbl_jinlong_system_user_info ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT user_id AS userId, real_name AS realName, nick_name AS nickName, gender AS gender, age AS age, id_number AS idNumber, telephone AS telephone, zone_id AS zoneId, address AS address, post_code AS postCode, home_page AS homePage, qq_number AS qqNumber, ali_pay AS aliPay, image AS image, description AS description, state AS state FROM tbl_jinlong_system_user_info ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT #{count}
